ygData.subject: Re: high level bard suggestion
ygData.msgSnippet: Perhaps the people on the other list wouldn t fill that way if they had been reading some of the posts on this list by JM and the other high level
ygData.messageBody:
Perhaps the people on the other list wouldn't fill that way if they had been
reading some of the posts on this list by JM and the other high level
contributors:-).

I did notice one of the posts was from a member of the Fires of Heaven guild
(the guild who recently kiiled Lady Vox with/without the help of Aradune).
I play on E'ci so have no idea how this guild operates and really don't
care. However, if you believe some of the recent posts on EQVault, the
Fires of Heaven guild consists primarily of powergamers. From all the great
posts I have read on this list, the general consensus among us seems to
indicate that playing a bard is not very suitable to the type of person who
powergames. Perhaps that is why the poster felt that bards were useless.
Pure speculation on my part.

Galtin
Bard and Master Brewer of E'ci


<snip>
>
> Hi Crip Fireblade from FoH here...
> lvl 49 bard on Veeshan
>
> My question or statement is really bards are totally screwed over at
> high levels.
> Not only do they have no chance of meleeing even a tenth as well as a
> warrior, but there
> are NO high level songs that are worthwhile.
>
